title: The Story of Xin Chuan - Novel Updates
tags: Death of Loved Ones   Depression   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Single Parent
author: 陆归
description:
Two years after her husband’s unexpected death, Chen Yuan received a letter in his mailbox, asking how he was after all these years. Chen Yuan had never heard of that name and was surprised that people still sent emails these days. In a moment of spontaneity, she replied to the letter in her husband’s name.
Since then, everything he had hidden and revealed gradually came to light like water melting on an icy mountain.
>
